name: Choke
message: %USER% places their hand around %TARGET%'s neck, choking them!
user_messages: You place your hand around %TARGET%'s neck, choking them!
You place your hand around %TARGET%'s airway, choking them.
You grab %TARGET% by the neck, squeezing their throat!
target_messages: You feel %USER% place their hand on your neck and choke you. It's difficult to breathe!
You choke as %USER% constricts your neck!
You feel a little light-headed as %USER% puts pressure on your airway!
You can feel %USER%'s fingers squeezing your throat!
